Package model

Interface IBuy

All Known Implementing Classes:
Premium, Regular
public interface IBuy
The IBuy interface represents the behavior of a user to buy and manage bibliographic products.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    cancelMagazineSubscription(Magazine magazine, Transaction bill)
    Cancels a magazine subscription and adds the transaction to the bill.
    boolean
    eliminateBook(Book book, Transaction bill)
    Eliminates a purchased book and adds the transaction to the bill.
    boolean
    purchaseBook(Book book, Transaction bill)
    Purchases a book and adds the transaction to the bill.
    boolean
    suscribeMagazine(Magazine magazine, Transaction bill)
    Subscribes to a magazine and adds the transaction to the bill.

  • Method Details

    • purchaseBook

      boolean purchaseBook(Book book, Transaction bill)
      Purchases a book and adds the transaction to the bill.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to purchase
      bill - The transaction bill to add the purchase to
      Returns:
      true if the purchase is successful, false otherwise

    • suscribeMagazine

      boolean suscribeMagazine(Magazine magazine, Transaction bill)
      Subscribes to a magazine and adds the transaction to the bill.
      Parameters:
      magazine - The magazine to subscribe to
      bill - The transaction bill to add the subscription to
      Returns:
      true if the subscription is successful, false otherwise

    • eliminateBook

      boolean eliminateBook(Book book, Transaction bill)
      Eliminates a purchased book and adds the transaction to the bill.
      Parameters:
      book - The book to eliminate
      bill - The transaction bill to add the elimination to
      Returns:
      true if the elimination is successful, false otherwise

    • cancelMagazineSubscription

      boolean cancelMagazineSubscription(Magazine magazine, Transaction bill)
      Cancels a magazine subscription and adds the transaction to the bill.
      Parameters:
      magazine - The magazine subscription to cancel
      bill - The transaction bill to add the cancellation to
      Returns:
      true if the cancellation is successful, false otherwise
